      Which of the following is the correct sequence of appearances of Moon phases in the sky?
      • new moon, full moon, waxing crescent, waning crescent
      • waxing crescent, first quarter, waxing gibbous, full moon
      • full moon, waxing gibbous, third quarter, waning crescent
      • new moon, waning crescent, first quarter, full moon

      If you were going to send a spacecraft to circle the Moon and photograph the entire far side (the side not visible from Earth), during which lunar phase (as seen from Earth) would you do the photography?
      • new moon
      • first or third quarter
      • full moon
      • It really doesn't make any difference.
